title: JavaScript Develop
content:
We are looking for a Senior Python Developer as a full-time position for our office in Wroclaw.

Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement back-end services
  • Integrate with third party services
  • Deploy applications on AWS or GCP using Docker and Kubernetes
  • Prepare and integrate with CI/CD systems

Job requirements

  • Fluent in English with great communication skills
  • 2+ years experience in Python
  • knowing one Python web framework (except Flask because Flask is a cancer 😃)
  • Knowing GIT to the bone
  • Good SQL understanding, preferably experience with one noSQL database (MongoDB does not count 😃 )
  • Experience with Docker
  • Live and breathe TDD
  • You love pytest

Nice to have:

  • Experience and passion to DevOps work, you know Ansible, Terraform or similar, you use bash everyday and can't live without proper CI/CD pipeline
  • Experience in Kubernetes
  • Experience in at least one modern JavaScript framework like Vue, React or Angular (or willing to learn) 
  • Experience in leading a team (both: tech lead skills and mentorship attitude are highly appreciated)

Other perks:
  • Flexible office hours
  • 20 paid vacation days
  • Superb coffee in the office
  • We do projects for various industries, you'll never be bored
